COMMENT_TX: $Steve Sax hit a ground ball back to Frank Pastore, who looked at Mike Scioscia, who was hung up off 3B, and didn't recognize what he was seeing; instead, Pastore threw out Sax at 1B, while the reprieved Scioscia ran the rest of the way to HP
ej,bevak001,P,westj901,Leaving bench to charge mound after HBP $Kurt Bevacqua charged the mound from the bench and was ejected by 1B umpire Joe West; Bevacqua was not in the game
